remarks:
"At most one" picks a variable value, eliminating an existential quantifier.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Sep-2019.)

 "At most one" picks a variable value, eliminating an existential quantifier.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-1997.)
statement: mopick $p |- ( ( E* x ph /\ E. x ( ph /\ ps ) ) -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
